Description:
------------
Videogame-themed action-adventure war whose story is set in the dark period of the Middle Ages, during the time of the Knights Templar. The title focuses on the period of the Crusades of the twelfth century and has three playable characters, 150 different weapons available and a score of environments and scenarios.
